title: Can we report people in Champ Select?
body:
Title. :)

Had to dodge 8 games this week because of premades supporting the people they were partied with in trolling(eg. someone says they got top when they joined late and precedes to instalock and their premade supports them and flames the person who actually got top) so I was wondering if I could actually report them(it doesn't seem like you can but then again my eyesight isn't exactly amazing...:P).

replies.body: what kind of flaming are we talking about? because that's the only reportable action you mentioned.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hrFoGtGE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-19T04:20:14.982+0000)
>
> what kind of flaming are we talking about? because that's the only reportable action you mentioned.

Something like this: 
Person 1: Top
Person 2 has joined the room
Person 2: top
Person 1: i got top sorry
Person 2: No you didnt u lil *****
Person 3: Yea person 2 got top stfu

I'm not sure if that's considered flaming, but would it be reportable?

> [{quoted}](name=iDeadly,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hrFoGtGE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-19T09:50:21.971+0000)
>
> Something like this: 
> Person 1: Top
> Person 2 has joined the room
> Person 2: top

> Person 2: No you didnt u lil *****

no.
I dont believe there is a report feature unyil after the game.
